casebody.data:
CHERNEY
v.
NC ZOOLOGICAL PARK. No. 606A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Michael W. Clark, Joe Thomas Knott, III, Raleigh, Kenneth R. Murphy, III, for Tinya Cherney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Five Day Extension Allowed. Defendant (N.C. Zoological Park) shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
